msg: Diagram of JSR-88.  For now just referred to by the Wiki.  Would make

author: janb
msg: Adding ability to deploy a webapp. Almost there - still one problem with the scanner giving
me the same webapp to deploy twice if the war exists at startup time. Hot deploy works. Jsp
path is still messed up - Jetty wants javax.servlet etc classes on the system classpath
but they aren't. Hot deploying a war without JSPs should work.
